item.title: The House Hot Sheet for Week 1 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats
item.description: News article "The House Hot Sheet for Week 1 of the 2025 Legislative Session – Washington State House Democrats" from House Democrats.

item.title: 👎💵Andrew Hackman - AMERIPEN
item.description: Andrew Hackman signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent AMERIPEN. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Mark Johnson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Washington Retail Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
